title: BRIEF-Shopify Reports Q1 Loss Per Share C$0.16
text:
May 1, 2018 / 11:14 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Shopify Reports Q1 Loss Per Share C$0.16 Reuters Staff
May 1 (Reuters) - Shopify Inc:
* SHOPIFY ANNOUNCES FIRST-QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES 2018 REVENUES IN RANGE OF $1 BILLION TO $1.01 BILLION
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $214.3 MILLION, UP 68 PERCENT FROM Q1 2017
* SEES 2018 GAAP OPERATING LOSS IN RANGE OF $105 MILLION TO $110 MILLION * Q1 LOSS PER SHARE C$0.16
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED OPERATING PROFIT IN RANGE OF $0 MILLION TO $5 MILLION * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.04
* SEES Q2 REVENUES IN RANGE OF $230 MILLION TO $235 MILLION
* SEES Q2 ADJUSTED OPERATING LOSS IN RANGE OF $5 MILLION TO $7 MILLION
* SEES Q2 2018 GAAP OPERATING LOSS IN RANGE OF $32 MILLION TO $34 MILLION
* GMV (GROSS MERCHANDISE VOLUME) FOR Q1 2018 WAS $8.0 BILLION, UP $3.1 BILLION, OR 64 PERCENT OVER Q1 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
